entries.title: California governor signs bill forcing social media company transparency
entries.description: California’s new social media transparency law could face challenges from the tech industry, which has sued to block laws regulating content moderation in conservative states.

entries.title: Sony reveals ‘Tekken 8’ and new ‘God of War: Ragnarok’ trailer
entries.description: Sony announces “Tekken 8,” “Rise of the Ronin," “Like a Dragon: Ishin!” and a new story trailer for the upcoming “God of War: Ragnarok.”

entries.title: The best video games of 2022 so far
entries.description: These are the best games of 2022, so far, on mobile, Switch, PlayStation and Xbox, starting with Wordle and Elden Ring.

entries.title: ‘Breath of the Wild’ sequel ‘Tears of the Kingdom’ revealed by Nintendo
entries.description: Nintendo revealed the title of its next Zelda game, "Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom" during a company live stream.

entries.title: Discord is now on Xbox for everyone, but setup takes a few steps
entries.description: The popular voice chat app is now available on the Xbox console, but it won't be a one-click experience.

entries.title: Live updates: Twitter whistleblower Peiter Zatko testifies before Congress
entries.description: Twitter whistleblower Peiter Zatko's responses to lawmakers could provide further evidence that could add to Twitter's legal and political problems.

entries.title: What TikTok and Facebook may track with their in-app browsers
entries.description: Meta and TikTok are spinning up ‘custom browsers' equipped with potential key loggers, a researcher warns. Here's how concerned to be and what you can do to keep your data safe.
